verses.verse: O sing <WH7891> <WH8798> unto the YY <WH3068> a new <WH2319> song <WH7892>: sing <WH7891> <WH8798> unto the YY <WH3068>, all the earth <WH776>.
Sing <WH7891> <WH8798> unto the YY <WH3068>, bless <WH1288> <WH8761> his name <WH8034>; shew forth <WH1319> <WH8761> his salvation <WH3444> from day <WH3117> to day <WH3117>.
Declare <WH5608> <WH8761> his glory <WH3519> among the heathen <WH1471>, his wonders <WH6381> <WH8737> among all people <WH5971>.
For the YY <WH3068> is great <WH1419>, and greatly <WH3966> to be praised <WH1984> <WH8794>: he is to be feared <WH3372> <WH8737> above all 'elohim <WH430>.
For all the 'elohim <WH430> of the nations <WH5971> are idols <WH457>: but the YY <WH3068> made <WH6213> <WH8804> the heavens <WH8064>.
Honour <WH1935> and majesty <WH1926> are before <WH6440> him: strength <WH5797> and beauty <WH8597> are in his sanctuary <WH4720>.
Give <WH3051> <WH8798> unto the YY <WH3068>, O ye kindreds <WH4940> of the people <WH5971>, give <WH3051> <WH8798> unto the YY <WH3068> glory <WH3519> and strength <WH5797>.
Give <WH3051> <WH8798> unto the YY <WH3068> the glory <WH3519> due unto his name <WH8034>: bring <WH5375> <WH8798> an offering <WH4503>, and come <WH935> <WH8798> into his courts <WH2691>.
O worship <WH7812> <WH8690> the YY <WH3068> in the beauty <WH1927> of holiness <WH6944>: fear <WH2342> <WH8798> before <WH6440> him, all the earth <WH776>.

Say <WH559> <WH8798> among the heathen <WH1471> that the YY <WH3068> reigneth <WH4427> <WH8804>: the world <WH8398> also shall be established <WH3559> <WH8735> that it shall not be moved <WH4131> <WH8735>: he shall judge <WH1777> <WH8799> the people <WH5971> righteously <WH4339>.
Let the heavens <WH8064> rejoice <WH8055> <WH8799>, and let the earth <WH776> be glad <WH1523> <WH8799>; let the sea <WH3220> roar <WH7481> <WH8799>, and the fulness <WH4393> thereof.
Let the field <WH7704> be joyful <WH5937> <WH8799>, and all that is therein: then shall all the trees <WH6086> of the wood <WH3293> rejoice <WH7442> <WH8762>

Before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>: for he cometh <WH935> <WH8804>, for he cometh <WH935> <WH8804> to judge <WH8199> <WH8800> the earth <WH776>: he shall judge <WH8199> <WH8799> the world <WH8398> with righteousness <WH6664>, and the people <WH5971> with his truth <WH530>.
